content.en: Image Retrieval Algorithms: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to improve the efficiency and accuracy of content-based medical image retrieval. These algorithms, such as the Cbmir algorithm, BoW representations, and distance metric learning algorithms, are designed to combine different types of information, such as shape, texture, and resolution, to enhance the retrieval process. By using these algorithms, researchers aim to make it easier for medical professionals to find and analyze specific images related to different diseases and conditions.
content.da: Algoritmer til billedsøgning: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre effektiviteten og nøjagtigheden af indholdsbaseret medicinsk billedsøgning. Disse algoritmer, såsom Cbmir-algoritmen, BoW-repræsentationer og distance-metrik læringsalgoritmer, er designet til at kombinere forskellige typer information, såsom form, tekstur og opløsning, for at optimere søgeprocessen. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer stræber forskere efter at gøre det lettere for læger at finde og analysere specifikke billeder relateret til forskellige sygdomme og tilstande.
